title: Counted in M2 but not M1

content.question: Which of the following is counted in the <math overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>M</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> measure, but not the <math overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>M</mtext> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> measure, of the United States money supply?

topic.text: 4.3: Definition, Measurement, and Functions of Money

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
